Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's start the <RED><MOJI0>
<MOJI1>
<MOJI2></RED> competition!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please say hello to our four
contestants.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 1
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 2
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 3
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Entry No. 4
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <CHARANAME1>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And how about a big round of applause
for our judge, Emma.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pleased to see you all. I am Emma. I
will be very fair in my judging, so
let's make this a great competition!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now let's move on to the actual
judging. Please wait while the judge
makes her decision.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for waiting. Now to 
announce the results.

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
And our winner is...

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
From <CHARANAME0> Farm, <BLUE><CHARANAME4></BLUE>!
<CHARANAME4>, congratulations! How
about a big round of applause!

<FACE_EMA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And in second place is <CHARANAME1>, third
place <CHARANAME2>, and <CHARANAME3>
takes fourth.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now it's time for the awards ceremony.
<CHARANAME4>, please step forward.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here is your prize: 
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN>! I hope you will
continue to grow your wonderful crops.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN>!
<PAGE>
I hope you will continue to grow your
wonderful crops.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations! Here are your prizes:
<GREEN><ITEMNAME0></GREEN> and...
<PAGE>
<GREEN><ITEMNAME1></GREEN> and
<GREEN><ITEMNAME2></GREEN> blueprints!
Please continue to grow wonderful crops.

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your vegetable brand is now an
<RED>Unknown Brand</RED>. Keep aiming for
something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your vegetable brand is now a
<RED>Popular Brand</RED>. Keep aiming for
something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your vegetable brand is now a
<RED>Top Brand</RED>. Don't get too
complacent. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your fruit brand is now an
<RED>Unknown Brand</RED>. Keep aiming for
something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your fruit brand is now a 
<RED>Popular Brand</RED>. Keep aiming for
something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your fruit brand is now a
<RED>Top Brand</RED>. Don't get too
complacent. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your flower, herb and fiber brand is now
an <RED>Unknown Brand</RED>. Keep aiming for
something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your flower, herb and fiber brand is now
a <RED>Popular Brand</RED>. Keep aiming for
something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your flower, herb and fiber brand is now
a <RED>Top Brand</RED>. Don't get too
complacent. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your tea, paddy crop and grain brand is
now an <RED>Unknown Brand</RED>. 
<PAGE>
Keep aiming for something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your tea, paddy crop and grain brand is
now a <RED>Popular Brand</RED>. 
<PAGE>
Keep aiming for something better!

<FACE_EMA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Your tea, paddy crop and grain brand is
now a <RED>Top Brand</RED>. 
<PAGE>
Don't get too complacent. Keep up the
good work!

Compared to when you had "No Brand"
status, your vegetable shipping prices
have gone up by <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>! Good job!

Compared to when you had "No Brand"
status, your fruit shipping prices have
gone up by <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>! Good job!

Compared to "No Brand" status, your
flower, herb, and fiber crop shipping
prices have gone up <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>!

Compared to when you had "No Brand"
status, your tea, paddy crop and grain
prices have gone up by <BLUE><MOJI0></BLUE>! Good job!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This concludes <RED><MOJI0>
<MOJI1>
<MOJI2></RED>. Thanks!
